remarks: The zero vector is a vector.  ( ~ ax-hv0cl analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)
statement:
slmd0vcl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
slmd0vcl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
slmd0vcl $p |- ( W e. SLMod -> .0. e. V ) $.
